name: picnic
description: A lighweight CSS library with nice defaults and many plugins to kickstart your projects

scripts.setremotes: git remote set-url --add --push origin git@github.com:picnicss/picnic.git && git remote set-url --add --push origin git@github.com:picnicss/picnicss.github.io.git
